column4: hello guys can someone please name me a good download manager
my bot says The BESTEST download manager is aria2, because 2 people (67%) said so! Follow in order, kget (1 votes, 33%), jigdo, gwget, slimrat, wmget, fatrat, d4x, slimrat-nox, tucan, multiget, uget
google earth is a proprietary program that cannot be included in the repos. however, the Google Earth installation site has a package for Ubuntu - just install it
